eligibility: Eligibility varies by course. For B.Tech, candidates must have passed 10+2 with Physics, Mathematics, and Chemistry/Biology/Biotechnology/Technical Vocational subject. For other UG/PG courses, eligibility is as per course requirements. Admissions to B.Tech are now through JEE Main, and B.Arch through NATA; other courses use CUET UG/PG scores.[1][3][4]

faqs.question: Is UPSEE/UPCET still conducted for B.Tech admissions?
faqs.answer: No, UPSEE/UPCET has been scrapped for B.Tech admissions. Admissions are now through JEE Main for B.Tech and NATA for B.Arch. Other courses use CUET UG/PG scores.[1][3][4]
